exercises.question: What is the maximum amount of money you can spend on your credit card?
Have you ever ______ a loan from this bank?
I have ______ my credit card bill already.
A monthly payment for a loan is called an ______.
She ______ never applied for a mortgage.
The ______ shows how much you currently owe.
We have ______ to several banks for a business loan.
A high ______ helps you get better interest rates.
Has he ______ his PIN number again?
The ______ period is when you don't pay interest on new purchases.
They have ______ the contract.
What happens if you ______ on a loan?
I ______ never used a credit card.
The ______ rate on this card is 15%.
Has she ______ the documents?
You can pay in 12 monthly ______.
We ______ already checked our balance.
A ______ is a loan specifically for buying a house.
Have you ______ to the bank manager?
The bank ______ increased my credit limit.
I have ______ (lose) my credit card.
The ______ ______ (two words) is 2000 euros.
Has he ______ (pay) the interest yet?
We can pay in six monthly ______.
I ______ never ______ (be) in debt.
Your ______ ______ (two words) is very high, so you can get the loan.
She ______ ______ (not / receive) the statement yet.
The ______ on my account is zero.
______ you ever ______ (apply) for a mortgage?
The ______ ______ (two words) is 5% per year.
They ______ ______ (just / sign) the loan agreement.
If you don't pay, you will ______ on your loan.
I ______ ______ (not / spend) all my credit limit.
The ______ ______ (two words) lasts for 30 days.
Has the bank ______ (increase) your limit?
We ______ ______ (meet) our financial advisor.
I need to check my ______ before buying this.
He ______ ______ (never / have) a credit card.
You have ______ (choose) the best repayment plan.
______ they ______ (send) the confirmation email?
have / I / for / applied / loan / a
exercises.answer: I have applied for a loan

exercises.question: has / she / paid / her / bill / already
exercises.answer: she has already paid her bill

exercises.question: you / have / ever / a / credit / used / card / ?
exercises.answer: have you ever used a credit card ?

exercises.question: limit / my / bank / the / has / increased
exercises.answer: the bank has increased my limit

exercises.question: not / we / have / received / documents / the
exercises.answer: we have not received the documents

exercises.question: in / pay / installments / can / you
has / his / he / score / credit / checked
exercises.answer: he has checked his credit score

exercises.question: interest / very / high / is / the / rate
exercises.answer: the interest rate is very high

exercises.question: never / I / defaulted / have / a / on / loan
exercises.answer: I have never defaulted on a loan
